**Example 1: 重新关联文件与场景**



Input: 

```
tccli pts UpdateFileScenarioRelation --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId project-ksqyndry \
    --ScenarioIds scenario-jp98fx4g \
    --FileId file-03874f00
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "9139da45-84a5-4212-aff6-a05fd1a2e7f7"
    }
}
```
